class.name: PIXI.InteractionManager
class.help: The interaction manager deals with mouse and touch events. Any DisplayObject can be interactive\nif its interactive parameter is set to true\nThis manager also supports multitouch.

private.name: collectInteractiveSprite
private.help: Collects an interactive sprite recursively to have their interactions managed

private.name: hitTest
private.help: Tests if the current mouse coordinates hit a sprite

parameters.name: item
parameters.help: The displayObject to test for a hit

parameters.name: interactionData
parameters.help: The interactionData object to update in the case there is a hit

private.name: onMouseDown
private.help: Is called when the mouse button is pressed down on the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a mouse button being pressed down

private.name: onMouseMove
private.help: Is called when the mouse moves across the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of the mouse moving

private.name: onMouseOut
private.help: Is called when the mouse is moved out of the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a mouse being moved out

private.name: onMouseUp
private.help: Is called when the mouse button is released on the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a mouse button being released

private.name: onTouchEnd
private.help: Is called when a touch is ended on the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a touch ending on the renderer view

private.name: onTouchMove
private.help: Is called when a touch is moved across the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a touch moving across the renderer view

private.name: onTouchStart
private.help: Is called when a touch is started on the renderer element

parameters.name: event
parameters.help: The DOM event of a touch starting on the renderer view

private.name: setTarget
private.help: Sets the target for event delegation

parameters.name: target
parameters.help: the renderer to bind events to

private.name: setTargetDomElement
private.help: Sets the DOM element which will receive mouse/touch events. This is useful for when you have other DOM\nelements on top of the renderers Canvas element. With this you'll be able to delegate another DOM element\nto receive those events

parameters.name: domElement
parameters.help: the DOM element which will receive mouse and touch events

private.name: update
private.help: updates the state of interactive objects

public.name: currentCursorStyle
public.help: The css style of the cursor that is being used

public.name: mouseOut
public.help: Is set to true when the mouse is moved out of the canvas

public.name: touches
public.help: An object that stores current touches (InteractionData) by id reference

private.name: interactiveItems
private.help: An array containing all the iterative items from the our interactive tree
